rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the west side, designed for natural lighting and enhanced ventilation. The orientation ensures a serene ambiance according to Vastu principles.
A functional dining space adjacent to the living area. The design incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows on its eastern side, ensuring ample morning light and aligning with Vastu guidelines.
Modern kitchen space with integrated storage and a layout that supports efficient workflow. Floor-to-ceiling windows on the eastern side provide natural light while maintaining privacy.
Well-equipped bathroom ensuring privacy and ease of access. Design includes minimal windows to maintain temperature control as per Vastu recommendations.
Dedicated space for storage of cleaning and maintenance equipment. Features a small window for ventilation while aligning with local building norms.

openings.description: Main entrance positioned at the north-east corner to invite positive energy in accordance with Vastu. The doorway is wide and inviting, with floor-to-ceiling glass elements for modern appeal.
Secondary exit located at the south-east corner to facilitate smooth traffic flow and emergency exits. Minimalistic design with functional window elements.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on the west wall to provide expansive views and enhance natural lighting in alignment with Vastu principles.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on the north wall to maximize daylight and maintain balanced energy flow.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and a private balcony. Designed for comfort and tranquility, the room features floor-to-ceiling windows oriented to minimize harsh afternoon sunlight.
Additional bedroom with integrated study space or dressing area. Floor-to-ceiling windows are placed to maintain a balanced light distribution while ensuring privacy.
Additional bedroom with integrated dressing area and access to balcony. The design emphasizes natural light without compromising privacy.
Additional bedroom with built-in storage solutions. Windows are oriented to optimize light while ensuring a calm atmosphere.
Guest room with a convertible space that can also serve as an office. Floor-to-ceiling windows are included for ample natural light.
Guest bathroom ensuring privacy and accessibility. The design features minimal window elements for comfort.

openings.description: Main staircase connecting the ground floor and first floor, ensuring smooth vertical circulation. Designed with a central focus to support the flow of energy.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on the east wall for balanced natural lighting and ventilation in master bedroom area.
Balconies or open terraces adjoining select bedrooms to enhance the living experience and ensure compliance with local building norms.
